title: Self-Directed Learning Design Using Nursing Podcasts

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: In online learning environments with digital devices, multimodal delivery methods are required to accommodate diverse learning styles.

learning_goals: Learners can explain nursing core concepts with over 85% comprehension by combining podcast listening with text-based materials.
Learners can propose three or more strategies for effectively utilizing podcast content in a multitasking environment
Learners can analyze and document two or more advantages of voice-based learning tools for enhancing human connection in virtual lectures
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
